title: Very recommendable movie
review: Beautiful movie! This movie makes me want to visit New Zealand and learn ski touring. The combination of the wonderful landscapes you can find in the Southern Alps, the feeling of adventure while climbing, traversing or skiing down those mountains, and the interest of the story narrated just make, as the title suggests, the perfect symphony

title: Not your average adrenaline-fuelled ski film
review: A mountain film that also appeals to people who don't often go into the mountains.
